page.title: 06VILLAGERS OLD AND NEW
page.content: The Pioneer Stores is managed by an Indian family who moved to Silver End about 18 months ago.Their daughter attends Silver End School.The family like the village but may return to India sometime,where their relatives still live.The school caretaker has lived in Silver End for over 50 years The family moved from Wales when he was five.He attended the school,which was smaller then,as was the village. He owned the Hardware shop until 7 years ago,when he took up his present job.The first villagers were all Crittall workers,but gradually the population has increased.During the 2nd World War there were a number of Polish refugees,some of whom stayed on.The families that came to the new village were from a varied background, industrial and mining as well as from many Essex towns and villages.
